Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Ensure the SMTP protocols are implemented according to RFC 2821
Conformance Test Details:
Test Script will verify the sequence of commands from RFC2821 Section 3.1 and Section 4.1.1.1 w.r.t session initiation.
HELO
EHLO
Expected Test Results: CORRECT sequence to be initiated by the SUT and the connection is successful

Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: HELO/EHLO Validation
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will validate according to RFC requirements from section 4.1.1.1
Expected Test Results: CORRECT sequence to be initiated by the SUT and the connection is successful

Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Ensure the SMTP protocols are implemented according to RFC 2821
Conformance Test Details:
Test script will validate command sequences from RFC2821 section 3.3
MAIL FROM
RCPT TO
DATA 
End Of Mail
Expected Test Results: CORRECT sequence to be initiated by the SUT and the connection is successful

Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Ensure MAIL command validation
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will validate according to RFC 2821 requirements from section 4.1.1.2
Expected Test Results: CORRECT format used for the MAIL  command by SUT.

Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Ensure RCPT TO command validation
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will validate according to  RFC 2821 requirements from section 4.1.1.3
Expected Test Results: CORRECT format used for the RCPT TO command by SUT.

Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Ensure DATA command validation
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will validate according to  RFC 2821 requirements from section 2.3.7, section 2.3.9 and section 4.1.1.4
Expected Test Results: CORRECT format used for the DATA command by SUT.

Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Domain Name Validation
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will validate the Domain Name Validation according to RFC 2821 section 2.3.5
Expected Test Results: Correct Domain Name format to be used by SUT.

Flow: SUT initates session to HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Mailbox and Address Validation
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will validate the Mailbox and Address according to RFC 2821 section 2.3.10, section 4.5.3.1
Expected Test Results: Correct Mailbox and Addresses to be used by SUT.

Flow: SUT receives mail from HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Initiate SMTP Session using valid commands
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will send valid SMTP commands to intiate the session according to Section 4.1.1 of RFC 2821, (Ensure support for  HELO/EHLO, MAIL FROM, RCPT TO, DATA, RESET, QUIT, NOOP, VRFY)
Expected Test Results: SUT accepts the valid commands and establishes connection.

Flow: SUT receives mail from HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Send invalid data as part of the DATA command
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will send invalid data as part of the DATA command. (e.g Bad line feeds)
Expected Test Results: SUT rejects the data as part of the session.

Flow: SUT receives mail from HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Initiate SMTP Session using invalid commands to ensure the SUT does not behave incorrectly.
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will send invalid SMTP commands to intiate the session following exception paths identified in Section 4.1.1 and 4.1.4 of RFC 2821 (For e.g closing the session abruptly)
Expected Test Results: SUT rejects the commands as invalid by using appropriate responses.

Flow: SUT receives mail from HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for Size limits of various SMTP commands
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will send data beyond the allowed size limits per RFC 2821 section 4.5.3.1 to the SUT to ensure that they are appropriately rejected.
Expected Test Results: SUT rejects the data as invalid by using appropriate responses.

Flow: SUT receives mail from HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for timeouts of various SMTP commands
Conformance Test Details: Test script will keep the transaction open for beyond the specified timelimits in RFC 2821 section 4.5.3.2
Expected Test Results: SUT obeys timeout specifications from the RFC.

Flow: SUT  initiates a STARTTLS to secure the channel with a HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for correct syntax and ability of the client to initiate a TLS session.
Conformance Test Details: Test script will validate the STARTTLS command and responses based on section 5 of RFC 2487.
Expected Test Results: Start a secure session based on the STARTTLS initiation by SUT

Flow: SUT  initiates a STARTTLS to secure the channel with a HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for correct syntax and ability of the client to initiate a TLS session and reject based on bad data.
Conformance Test Details: Test script will validate the STARTTLS command and responses based on section 5 of RFC 2487 but provide invalid certificate to see if the client is checking the certificates.
Expected Test Results: SUT rejects the connection due to bad certificate.

Flow: SUT receives a STARTTLS command to secure the channel from HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for correct syntax and ability of the server to start a TLS session.
Conformance Test Details: Test Script will send valid STARTTLS commands and responses according to section 5 of RFC 2487.
Expected Test Results: SUT accepts the TLS connection and opens a secure channel.

Flow: SUT receives a STARTTLS command to secure the channel from HISP or Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for correct syntax and ability of the server to start a TLS session.
Conformance Test Details: Test script will provide invalid STARTTLS commands and check for server behavior.
Expected Test Results: SUT rejects the TLS connection.

Flow: SUT tries to authenticate to an SMTP server which may be a HISP or an Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for ability of SUT to use PLAIN SASL mechanism.
Conformance Test Details: The SMTP server provides only PLAIN SASL as an option for the client to use to authenticate with pre-determined username/password according to section 2 of RFC 4616
Expected Test Results: SUT uses the provided username/password and performs a PLAIN SASL authentication successfully.

Flow: SUT tries to authenticate to an SMTP server which may be a HISP or an Edge
Purpose/Description: Test for ability of SUT to use DIGEST-MD5 mechanism.
Conformance Test Details: The SMTP server provides only DIGEST-MD5 as an option for the client to use to authenticate and verifies if the client can authenticate following section 2.1 of RFC 2831
Expected Test Results: SUT uses performs a DIGEST-MD5 SASL authentication successfully.

Flow: SUT tries to authenticate a client which may be a HISP or an edge
Purpose/Description: Test for the ability of SUT to accept PLAIN SASL from a client.
Conformance Test Details: The test tool will use PLAIN SASL as the only mechanism to authenticate  to the SUT using a pre-determined username/password according to section 2 of RFC 4616
Expected Test Results: SUT accepts a PLAIN SASL username/password authentication scheme and authenticates the client.

Flow: SUT tries to authenticate a client which may be a HISP or an edge
Purpose/Description: Test for the ability of SUT to accept DIGEST-MD5 from a client.
Conformance Test Details: The test tool will use DIGEST-MD5 as the only mechanism to authenticate to the SUT according to section 2.1 of RFC 2831
Expected Test Results: SUT accepts a DIGEST-MD5 authentication mechanism and authenticates the client.

Flow: SUT tries to authenticate a client which may be a HISP or an edge
Purpose/Description: Test for the ability of SUT to reject PLAIN SASL from a client.
Conformance Test Details: The test tool will use invalid PLAIN SASL username/password and tries to authenticate to the SUT according to section 2 of RFC 4616.
Expected Test Results: SUT rejects the authentication request due to bad username / password.

Flow: SUT tries to authenticate a client which may be a HISP or an edge
Purpose/Description: Test for the ability of SUT to accept DIGEST-MD5 from a client.
Conformance Test Details: The test tool will use invalid DIGEST-MD5 values to authenticate to the SUT according to section 2.1 of RFC 2831
Expected Test Results: SUT rejects the authentication request due to bad DIGEST-MD5 values.
